laboratory_examinations.findings: A novel heterozygous splicing variant in the MYH7 gene (c.896-1G>A) identified in the patient and her father. A heterozygous missense variant in the CD36 gene (c.760T>C, p.Phe254Leu) identified in the patient and her mother. Variants were considered likely pathogenic by multiple in silico algorithms.
The patient and her mother showed reduced CD36 expression compared with the father in both monocytes and platelets.
